name: Dear Friend (kgruszowski)
description:
Be careful on the internet otherwise, your computer will get infected by an unknown virus. Defend icons on your screen to defeat the virus.

Control:

  • Move - keys
  • Shoot - space
  • Reload - r
  • Change weapon - f

Team:

  1. Kamil Gruszowski
  2. Maciej Książek
  3. Dominik Cuprian
